channel.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
channel.description: I've been playing black mesa the past few hours straight,but I've spent an hour trying to get past it alone. i got all the power turned on and got the security door button on,but every time i try to sneak or run past the Gargantua he sees and kills me,am I doing something wrong?Any answers would be appreciated,thank you

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: King_Mango
item.description:
I did activate the power as you can see from the screenshot and from the text in my post. I looked all over after starting that fan several times I went into that room and nothing happened. I decided to go back and keep trying and that’s when the elevator came down.

So, yes, it’s a bug.

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
King Mango:

Ok the this time an elevator came down with some soldiers on it. That didn’t happen the other times I went into that room. Bug.

It’s not a bug. The elevator only comes down once you’ve activated the power. Just like HL1.

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: King_Mango
item.description:
That’s what I assumed but how do I get back up? The stairs are incomplete and I can’t find any other way out.

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
You go back to where the guard is and press the button in the control room. You should be able to just go straight up.

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: King_Mango
item.description:
A security guard who has been wounded tells me if I go below and power up the station we can take a train to the surface. I’ve powered up the fan but now what? I can’t find the way out. The stair well is missing a section and the fans won’t blow you up and out like in the big silo. (that was a nice little egg btw)

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96861019

Read full topic

Then I saw the two plugs and I was just like “Devs, you brilliant, sadistic assholes.” XP

item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: ArleeJ
item.description:
I’m having the same issue, didn’t want to report a bug, as it may be something ingame that I’m missing. I have the power on, security door open, when I make it to the generator only one prong is shooting electricity at intervals. There is no action if I try to hit the red button on the upper level, Gargantua is in position. Any help would be great.

*Found the cables mentioned above, Solution below:

There are two cables at the base of the ladder (look to the left and right) in the transformer room. Clever addition and easily overlooked by someone that played the game about a decade ago…

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.title: Power Up: all stuck posts collection
item.dc:creator: Black_August
item.description:
Mr.Cheshire:

I’ve been playing black mesa the past few hours straight,but I’ve spent an hour trying to get past it alone. i got all the power turned on and got the security door button on,but every time i try to sneak or run past the Gargantua he sees and kills me,am I doing something wrong?Any answers would be appreciated,thank you

The Gargantua can be killed by luring him into the adjacent power relay station, plugging in the cables then electrocuting him.

Edit After turning on the power of course.

Read full topic
item.source: Power Up: all stuck posts collection

item.description:
I remember that if you left the area for a short while, he sometimes wanders around his stomping grounds. That -might- give you the opportunity you need.
